segments.text: I take care of the letters . I may read , sort out and organize incoming mails .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: So you have to open all the envelopes .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , except the personal mail . And I also need to prepare the materials for posting and check the e-mail box regularly .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you need to file copies of the letters before sending them ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , and I check all the e-mails for Mr . Thomas .
